oai_dc:dc.dc:title: STABILITY ANALYSIS OF A CAISSON UNDER BREAKING WAVE BY MEANS OF A GRADUAL APPROACH
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Conte, Bruno
Savary, Cloe
Andrian, Frederic
Desprez, Sophie
Thevenot, Marie Coutos
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The design stages of breakwater projects include the stability analysis of the structures. In the project of the present article, two alternatives were studied: a rubble- mound and vertical caisson breakwaters. The challenges faced for the stability analysis of the caissons are presented and discussed here.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 38 (2024): Proceedings of 38th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Rome, Italy, 2024; structures.26
